page.title: 12POCKET MONEY BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: We have done a survey amongst our class on their{pocket money.}Here are the results from a class of 11 year olds.The range of {pocket money {goes from 20p to Â£4.00 per week. Some children have to earn their {pocket money}by doing chores around the house. They clean windows,wash the car or wash up.Most children think it best to earn their{pocket money}rather than get it as a matter of course.Most get their{pocket money}on Saturdays and usually spend it on sweets and pens or pencils for school. Roughly about half of the{pocket money} is saved up for special treats like going to the Fair or birthday presents.
